reviewText: I agree with the other review that it is tasteful and it is not porn. Unfortunately everytime I've tried to help someone find this copy of it gets sold out fast. It is the best version that I've seen. The other's are cheap imitations of this title and are just porn american style.

THE best Kama Sutra video, its full title is Penthouse Kama Sutra The Art of Making Love - 1993 A*Vision Entertainment, 60 minutes. It's not a typical porno-outfit produced silly multiple-hooking-up video, not hard-core. What it is is actual Kama Sutra positions from the Vatsayana book, done in a classy way, with good looking attractive actors, in pleasant surroundings, attractively lit, & irrestibly erotic. It has about a 10-12 minute introduction to the philosophy of Kama Sutra that is a good warm-up for those partners who might be a bit shy. The voice over explains each position in the repertoire, and why it might be a good one to explore. You'll be disappointed with anything less - Penthouse really should put this out on DVD!
